mapper.select: SELECT PI.PI_NUM, PM.PM_NUM, PI.PI_NAME, PM.PM_GRADE FROM USER_INFO UI INNER JOIN PARTY_MEMBER PM ON UI.UI_NUM = PM.UI_NUM INNER JOIN PARTY_INFO PI ON PM.PI_NUM = PI.PI_NUM WHERE UI.UI_NUM = #{uiNum}

SELECT PI.PI_NUM, PI.PI_NAME, PL.UI_NUM FROM PARTY_LIKE PL INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PL.UI_NUM = UI.UI_NUM INNER JOIN PARTY_INFO PI ON PL.PI_NUM = PI.PI_NUM WHERE PL.PL_ACTIVE = 1 AND PL.UI_NUM = #{uiNum}

SELECT MI.MNTNM, MUL.UI_NUM, MI.MI_NUM FROM MOUNTAIN_USER_LIKE MUL INNER JOIN MOUNTAIN_INFO MI ON MUL.MI_NUM = MI.MI_NUM INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.UI_NUM = MUL.UI_NUM WHERE MUL.MUL_CNT = 1 AND MUL.UI_NUM = #{uiNum}
